title: All 32 - Tennessee Titans: Confidence level in Ryan Tannehill plus chances to sign Jadeveon Clowney with Turron Davenport (Football 6/18)
description:
The Titans were the one of the NFL's biggest surprises last year, reaching the AFC Championship Game. They're on the radar a little more this year, but can they find repeat success? Turron Davenport, who covers the team for ESPN's NFL Nation, joins guest host John Breech to discuss their outlook in 2020. They cover the Titans interest in Tom Brady (1:00), belief in Ryan Tannehill and future for Derrick Henry (5:00). Does Jadeveon Clowney make sense in Nashville (9:30)? Turron breaks down the existing defense (11:30) plus the biggest expected position battle (15:45). Finally, what can this team truly accomplish this season (17:00)? 'All 32' has the answers and analysis!
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.

itunes:subtitle: Did the Titans ever seriously want Tom Brady or were they committed to Ryan Tannehill all along? Turron Davenport of ESPN talks all things Tennessee with us on 'All 32'.
